short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No need to search for coupons & deals. Get them right in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Free Browser Extension That Automatically Finds And Applies Coupon Codes At Checkout. Never search for a coupon again. 2gees finds the best code instantly. The browser extensions automatically apply coupons at checkout, or earn you cash back while online shopping.
